mapper.select: SELECT cate.rci_name as rciName , cate.sort_desc as sortDesc, img.file_url as imageId, cate.go_type as goType, cate.go_id as goId, cate.go_name as goName FROM home_recommend_cate AS cate LEFT JOIN sys_images AS img ON img.id = cate.image_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND cate.dealer_id =#{dealerId} AND cate.type =#{type} AND cate.state = 1
